YACHT SERVICES AND PROVISIONS

The Botilia Yachting Team is built to meet yours or your clients’ wine needs for an exclusive yacht service. Planing your yacht vacations in Greece and arranging your luxury yachting trip to the Aegean or the Ionian islands? Thinking of exploring Mykonos, Santorini or Corfu? Chartering a yacht or a superyacht and looking to provide your guests with top-notch yachting services and wine supplies? Our dedicated team and our worldwide network are here to provide the best service possible in wine provisions, with the Best Greek wines and the top international Fine Wines and champagnes.

OUR ADVANTAGE

We are the leading wine agency in Greece in discovering the most boutique wineries from Greece and abroad, distributing the Best Greek wines, the hardest to find wines and representing the top Greek winemakers. We’ve put all our wine expertise in scanning even the most remote Greek regions and delivering what’s best into the world. Our team is composed exclusively of WSET certified sommeliers willing to work around the clock and provide the appropriate wine assistance, your yacht vacations demand.

OUR SERVICES

Our wine services are designed to cover every need. We can deliver all wine requests, from the basic ones to even the most luxurious requests. You focus on what matters.

WINE PROVISIONS and SUPPLIES

Our services include:

  • Supply of the Best Greek wines, at all kinds of styles and price range, to let you get a great taste of Greece.

  • Fine Wines, whether it’s a unicorn Left-Bank Bordeaux, a specific vintage of a magnificent Champagne, an iconic Burgundy or a fascinating Super Tuscan, you name it and we deliver.  Besides our colleciton, we can  import any wine you 'd like if we know it in advance.

WINE CONSULTING and WINE TASTING

Our services include:

  • Wine consulting services in terms of wine storing, serving as well as food and wine pairings based on the menu your chef has prepared for your entire yacht trip.

  • Onboard wine presentations. Our WSET certified sommeliers can teach you all you need to know about the Best Greek wines, varieties, and regions throughout fully customizable presentation according to your time frame and wish.

 

 

Our experience and approach are at your disposal to make your yachting experience in Greece unforgettable.

 

CONTACT US
